a := (3+2)*7;
a["adei"]    := ("HOLA")+3;

begin

end

end

function test(ref integer a) is
integer i,j,a;
begin
    i := 2+3;

end

if (3 = 2) > 0 then
         var := 3 + 2;
	   else
          var := 4 + 5;
	   end
